parameters.query: SELECT * FROM markets WHERE active = true ORDER BY code

nodes.name: Get Active Markets
nodes.notes: Fetches all active markets from Supabase

nodes.name: Transform & Calculate Metrics
nodes.notes: Parse API responses and calculate SEO metrics

parameters.query:
=INSERT INTO daily_metrics (
  market_id,
  date,
  domain_rating,
  total_backlinks,
  referring_domains,
  dofollow_backlinks,
  average_ranking,
  total_ranked_keywords,
  keywords_top_1,
  keywords_top_3,
  keywords_top_10,
  keywords_top_20,
  keywords_top_30,
  estimated_traffic_value,
  organic_keywords_count
)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.market_id }}',
  '{{ $json.date }}',
  {{ $json.domain_rating }},
  {{ $json.total_backlinks }},
  {{ $json.referring_domains }},
  {{ $json.dofollow_backlinks }},
  {{ $json.average_ranking }},
  {{ $json.total_ranked_keywords }},
  {{ $json.keywords_top_1 }},
  {{ $json.keywords_top_3 }},
  {{ $json.keywords_top_10 }},
  {{ $json.keywords_top_20 }},
  {{ $json.keywords_top_30 }},
  {{ $json.estimated_traffic_value }},
  {{ $json.organic_keywords_count }}
)
ON CONFLICT (market_id, date)
DO UPDATE SET
  domain_rating = EXCLUDED.domain_rating,
  total_backlinks = EXCLUDED.total_backlinks,
  referring_domains = EXCLUDED.referring_domains,
  dofollow_backlinks = EXCLUDED.dofollow_backlinks,
  average_ranking = EXCLUDED.average_ranking,
  total_ranked_keywords = EXCLUDED.total_ranked_keywords,
  keywords_top_1 = EXCLUDED.keywords_top_1,
  keywords_top_3 = EXCLUDED.keywords_top_3,
  keywords_top_10 = EXCLUDED.keywords_top_10,
  keywords_top_20 = EXCLUDED.keywords_top_20,
  keywords_top_30 = EXCLUDED.keywords_top_30,
  estimated_traffic_value = EXCLUDED.estimated_traffic_value,
  organic_keywords_count = EXCLUDED.organic_keywords_count,
  updated_at = NOW()
RETURNING *;

nodes.name: Upsert Daily Metrics
nodes.notes: Save metrics to Supabase (upsert prevents duplicates)

parameters.query:
=INSERT INTO api_costs (
  workflow_name,
  market_id,
  operation_type,
  cost_usd,
  api_provider,
  response_metadata
)
VALUES
  ('Authority Collector - Daily Metrics', '{{ $json.market_id }}', 'ranked_keywords', {{ $json.keywords_api_cost }}, 'DataForSEO', '{"market": "{{ $json.market_code }}"}'),
  ('Authority Collector - Daily Metrics', '{{ $json.market_id }}', 'backlinks_summary', {{ $json.backlinks_api_cost }}, 'DataForSEO', '{"market": "{{ $json.market_code }}"}')
RETURNING *;

nodes.name: Log API Costs
nodes.notes: Track API costs for budget monitoring

parameters.query:
=-- Get today's metrics with previous day for delta calculation
WITH current_metrics AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM daily_metrics
  WHERE market_id = '{{ $json.market_id }}'
    AND date = '{{ $json.date }}'
),
previous_metrics AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM daily_metrics
  WHERE market_id = '{{ $json.market_id }}'
    AND date = (SELECT date - INTERVAL '1 day' FROM current_metrics)
)
SELECT
  c.market_id,
  c.date,
  m.code as market_code,
  m.name as market_name,
  m.domain,
  c.domain_rating,
  c.average_ranking,
  c.keywords_top_10,
  -- Calculate deltas
  COALESCE(c.domain_rating - p.domain_rating, 0) as domain_rating_delta,
  COALESCE(c.average_ranking - p.average_ranking, 0) as average_ranking_delta
FROM current_metrics c
JOIN markets m ON m.id = c.market_id
LEFT JOIN previous_metrics p ON true;

nodes.name: Get Metrics With Deltas
nodes.notes: Query current and previous day metrics for anomaly detection
